custom-meta.meta-value: Codes for accessing tree ring data are reported in tables S1-S3. NCEI Tree Ring Search Engine: www.ncdc.noaa.gov/paleo-search/?dataTypeId=18. Details for accessing species distribution data are provided in the text and in the reference #43. EUFORGEN Distribution Maps: www.euforgen.org/species. Details for accessing climate data are provided in the text and in the reference #45. WorldClim current climate: www.worldclim.org/current; future climate: www.worldclim.org/CMIP5v1.
